practice.title: Unbiased Research
practice.description: Always use Project Research mode for external research to ensure systematic, unbiased context gathering.

practice.title: Context7 Usage
practice.description: Leverage context7 MCP for authoritative documentation, code examples, and integration patterns. Validate findings before integration.

practice.title: Memory MCP Recording
practice.description: Persist all research findings and context in memory MCP for traceability and future agent collaboration.

practice.title: Delegation Protocol
practice.description: Other modes must delegate external research tasks to Project Research mode for persistent, systematic context.

practice.title: Audit Trail
practice.description: Maintain an audit trail of all research requests, findings, and delegations for compliance and review.
